User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0 Iceweasel/5.0
Build ID: 20110701125147

Steps to reproduce:

log in to bugizilla


Actual results:

doorhanger appeared over Firefox.

This means that I 

- cannot use the mouse wheel to 
   - scroll the bugzilla page, 
   - scroll tab bar 
- cannot use the mouse pointer to focus other windows (unrelated to Firefox) in focus-follows-mouse
- cannot focus Firefox with mouse pointer in focus-folllows-mouse if the doorhanger appears while Firefox is not focused

- when I use the keyboard to focus Firefox with doorhanger shown it is closed


Expected results:

either common dialogs like this should be shown as bar which is non-intrusive and works ok for questions related to single page or the doorhangers should be way less intrusive.
comments.author: hramrach@gmail.com
